import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { getAllProducts } from '../../../api/productAPI' import Navbar from '../../Navbar' import AdminSidebar from './AdminSidebar' const AdminProducts = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { getAllProducts() .then(data => { if(data.error) { console.log(data.error) } else { setProducts(data) } }) }, []) return ( <>

Products

{ products && products.map((product, i) => { return }) }
S.No. Product Image Product Name Unit Price Count in Stock Category Rating Action
{i + 1} Product Name Unit Price Count in Stock Category Rating Action
) } export default AdminProducts
